price: Dediler ki: “Evet, fakat biz sana (kavminin) şüphe etmekte olduğu azabı getirdik.”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
